ja481:3.2: Kareyya saṁ → kareyyāsaṁ (sya1ed, sya2ed); kareyya sa (mr); bhareyya saṁ (?) | kāḷikāyaṁ → kālikāya (sya1ed, sya2ed); kālikāyaṁ (pts-vp-pli1); kāḷikāya (mr)
ja481:4.1: yujjhamānānamayujjhamāno → yujjhamānānaṁ ayujjhamāno (sya1ed, sya2ed); yujjhamānena ayujjhamāno (mr)
ja481:6.3: galakāvakantaṁ → galakaṁ vikantā (sya1ed, sya2ed); galayā vikantuṁ (mr)
ja481:7.2: atthavasaṁ gatā me → atthavasāhatā ime (bj); atthavasābhatā ime (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1)
ja481:7.4: Ekaṁ punappātarāse → ekañca puna pātarāse (bj); ekañca naṁ pātarāse (pts-vp-pli1)
ja481:10.3: Tvaṁ nāthosi → tvaṁ-nātho'smi (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1)
ja481:10.4: nāthohaṁ bhariyāya me → amha-nāthā mama bhariyā (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed); nāthohaṁ bhariyāya ca (pts-vp-pli1)
ja481:12.1: paricitto aticitto → paracittena acitto (bj); paracittena aticitto (sya1ed, sya2ed); paracitto acitto (pts-vp-pli1)
